(g h : G)
(mnpos : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
(mngcd : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
(ha : ∀ k : Set.Icc 1 n, a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)))

```lean4
theorem putnam_2018_a4
(m n : ℕ)
(a : ℕ → ℤ)
(G : Type*) [Group G]
(g h : G)
(mnpos : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
(mngcd : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
(ha : ∀ k : Set.Icc 1 n, a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)))
(ghprod : ((List.Ico 1 (n + 1)).map (fun k : ℕ => g * h ^ (a k))).prod = 1)
: g * h = h * g := by
  have h1 := ghprod
  simp [List.prod_eq_one_iff] at h1
  have h2 := ha
  have h3 := mngcd
  have h4 := mnpos
  clear ha ghprod
  induction n with
  | zero => aesop
  | succ n ih =>
    cases n with
    | zero =>
      -- Base case: n = 1
      simp_all [Nat.gcd_eq_right, Nat.gcd_eq_left, Nat.floor_eq_iff]
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> aesop
    | succ n =>
      -- Inductive step
      simp_all [Nat.gcd_eq_right, Nat.gcd_eq_left, Nat.floor_eq_iff]
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> aesop
```

(mnpos : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
(mngcd : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
(ha : ∀ k : Set.Icc 1 n, a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)))

```lean4
theorem putnam_2018_a4
(m n : ℕ)
(a : ℕ → ℤ)
(G : Type*) [Group G]
(g h : G)
(mnpos : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
(mngcd : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
(ha : ∀ k : Set.Icc 1 n, a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)))
(ghprod : ((List.Ico 1 (n + 1)).map (fun k : ℕ => g * h ^ (a k))).prod = 1)
: g * h = h * g := by
  have h1 := ghprod
  simp [mul_pow, List.prod_map_mul, List.prod_replicate, List.prod_singleton] at h1
  have h2 : ∀ k : ℕ, k ∈ List.Ico 1 (n + 1) → a k = 0 := by
    intro k hk
    have h3 : k ∈ List.Ico 1 (n + 1) := hk
    have h4 : k ≥ 1 := by
      rw [List.mem_Ico] at h3
      linarith
    have h5 : k ≤ n := by
      rw [List.mem_Ico] at h3
      linarith
    have h6 : a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) := by
      apply ha
      exact ⟨h4, h5⟩
    rw [h6]
    have h7 : (m * k : ℝ) / n = (m * k : ℝ) / n := by rfl
    have h8 : (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) : ℝ) / n = (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) : ℝ) / n := by rfl
    have h9 : Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) := by rfl
    have h10 : Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) = Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) := by rfl
    have h11 : (Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) : ℤ) = (Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) : ℤ) := by rfl
    have h12 : (Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) : ℤ) = (Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) : ℤ) := by rfl
    norm_cast at h7 h8 h9 h10 h11 h12 ⊢
    <;> simp_all [Int.floor_eq_iff]
    <;> field_simp at *
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> norm_cast
    <;> omega
  have h3 : ∀ k : ℕ, k ∈ List.Ico 1 (n + 1) → g * h ^ (a k) = 1 := by
    intro k hk
    have h4 : a k = 0 := h2 k hk
    simp [h4]
  have h5 : ((List.Ico 1 (n + 1)).map (fun k : ℕ => g * h ^ (a k))).prod = 1 := ghprod
  simp_all [List.prod_map_mul, List.prod_replicate, List.prod_singleton]
  <;> aesop
```

(As usual, $\lfloor x \rfloor$ denotes the greatest integer less than or equal to $x$.)
-/

(m n : ℕ)
(a : ℕ → ℤ)
(G : Type*) [Group G]
(g h : G)
(mnpos : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
(mngcd : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
(ha : ∀ k : Set.Icc 1 n, a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)))
(ghprod : ((List.Ico 1 (n + 1)).map (fun k : ℕ => g * h ^ (a k))).prod = 1)

theorem putnam_2018_a4
(m n : ℕ)
(a : ℕ → ℤ)
(G : Type*) [Group G]
(g h : G)
(mnpos : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
(mngcd : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
(ha : ∀ k : Set.Icc 1 n, a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)))
(ghprod : ((List.Ico 1 (n + 1)).map (fun k : ℕ => g * h ^ (a k))).prod = 1)
: g * h = h * g := by
  have h1 := ghprod
  simp [mul_pow, List.prod_map_mul, List.prod_cons, List.prod_nil] at h1
  have h2 : ∀ k : ℕ, k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n → a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) := by
    intro k hk
    apply ha
    <;> simp_all [Set.mem_Icc]
    <;> omega
  have h3 : ∀ k : ℕ, k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n → a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) := by
    intro k hk
    apply ha
    <;> simp_all [Set.mem_Icc]
    <;> omega

    intro k hk

    <;> omega

theorem putnam_2018_a4
(m n : ℕ)
(a : ℕ → ℤ)
(G : Type*) [Group G]
(g h : G)
(mnpos : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
(mngcd : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
(ha : ∀ k : Set.Icc 1 n, a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)))
(ghprod : ((List.Ico 1 (n + 1)).map (fun k : ℕ => g * h ^ (a k))).prod = 1)
: g * h = h * g := by
  have h1 := ghprod
  simp [mul_pow, List.prod_map_mul] at h1
  have h2 : ∀ k : ℕ, k ∈ List.Ico 1 (n + 1) → a k = Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ)) := by
    intro k hk
    apply ha
    <;> simp_all [Set.Icc, Nat.succ_le_iff]
    <;> omega
  have h3 : ∀ k : ℕ, k ∈ List.Ico 1 (n + 1) → (g * h ^ (a k)) = g * h ^ (Int.floor (m * k / (n : ℝ)) - Int.floor (m * ((k : ℤ) - 1) / (n : ℝ))) := by
